name: Remember the Sky
description:
A simple match game using photos I took of the sky in South Padre Island, Texas.

The game only reveals the second card if it is a match. Have fun and try to match all the sky pix. Keep your head up to the sky :-)

**In case my html file doesn't work, you can play the game on my Unity profile:

https://connect.unity.com/mg/other/remember-the-sky
